title: Large-Scale Practitioner-Centered Open Language Project Development Course: Enhancing Text, Writing, and Expression Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language skills (reading, writing, grammar) and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies in developing real-world applicable language projects in digitally supported environments: Focuses on text analysis, writing strategies, and improving communication expressiveness.

learning_goals: Learners can develop language learning content (text/writing materials) by utilizing open educational resources (OER) at least three times within the project cycle (planning-development-evaluation).
Learners can apply problem-based learning (PBL) to language projects to produce and present at least one practical deliverable (e.g., multicultural communication strategy guide).
Learners can improve project outcomes by at least 80% using an assessment tool that incorporates peer feedback (analysis of expression, grammar, and vocabulary).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
